Verses: 2 kadalvazhiyaaith Thanneergalinmel Naanal Padavugalile Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppugiradhumaana Dhesaththukku Aiyo! Vegamaana Thoodhargale, Nedundhooramaaip Paraviyirukkiradhum, Siraikkappattadhum, Thuvakkamudhal Idhuvaraikkum Kediyaayirundhadhum, Alavidappattadhum, Midhikkappattadhum, Nadhigal Paazhaakkugiradhumaana Jaadhiyandaikkup Pongal.
3 poochchakkaraththil Vaasamaayirukkiravargalum, Dhesaththuk Kudigalumaagiya Neengalellaarum Malaigalinmel Kodiyetrappadumpodhu Paarungal, Ekkaalam Oodhappadumpodhu Kelungal.

4 naan Amarndhirundhu Payirinmel Kaayum Kaandhiyulla Veyilaippolavum, Aruppukkaalaththu Ushnaththil Undaagum Panimegaththaippolavum, En Vaasasthalaththilirundhu Kannokkuven Endru Karththar Ennudane Sonnaar.
5 dhraatchachchedigal Aruppukkumunne Pooppooththu Mutrik Kaaikkirak Kaaigal Pinjaayirukkumpodhe, Avar Arivaalgalinaale Kappukkavargalai Aruththuk Kodigalai Yarindhu Agatrippoduvaar.
6 avaigal Egamaai Malaigalin Patchigalukkum, Boomiyin Mirugangalukkum Vidappadum; Patchigal Adhinmel Kodaikaalaththilum, Kaattumirugangalellaam Adhinmel Maarikaalaththilum Thangum.

7 akkaalaththile Nedundhooramaaip Paraviyirukkiradhum Siraikkappattadhum, Thuvakkamudhal Idhuvaraikkum Kediyaayirundhadhum, Alavidappattadhum, Midhikkappattadhum, Nadhigal Paazhaakkugiradhumaana Jaadhiyaanadhu Senaigalin Karththarin Naamam Thangum Sthalamaagiya Seeyon Malaiyil Senaigalin Karththarukkuk Kaanikkaiyaagak Konduvarappadum.
